===Particle===
{{zh-particle}}

# {{lb|zh|Beginning Mandarin}} {{non-gloss definition|final interrogative particle on a yes/no question}}
#: {{zh-x|你 喜歡 嗎？|Do you like it?}}

====Usage notes====
The particle {{lang|zh|嗎}} allows turning an affirmative sentence into a interrogative sentence without modifying the sentence order.
: {{zh-x|他 喜歡。|He likes it.}}
: {{zh-x|他 喜歡 嗎？|Does he like it?}}

====See also====
* {{qualifier|Wu}} {{zh-l|𠲎}}
* Question particle: {{zh-l|呢}} (reciprocal questions).
